title: Bug 6536: Add Javadoc on field in TH does nothing
OB: When attempting to add Javadoc on a field in the Type Hierarchy view, nothing happens even after selecting the 'Add Javadoc' option from the context menu. The expected behavior is that the selected action should add the Javadoc for the field. Alternatively, if this action is not supported, the 'Add Javadoc' option should be removed from the context menu.
SR: To reproduce this issue, follow these steps: 1. Select a field in the Type Hierarchy view.
